General.Name: Rakovina Therapeutics Inc
General.Description: Rakovina Therapeutics Inc. engages in the research and development of new cancer treatments based on novel series of small-molecule DNA-damage response inhibitors (DDRi). Its preclinical product pipeline include kt-2000, a next generation oral targeted small molecule PARP inhibitors; kt-3000, a bi-functional small-molecule drug candidate; and kt-4000, a DNA-damaging DDR inhibitors. Rakovina Therapeutics Inc. was formerly known as Vincero Capital Corp. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1008 Beach Avenue, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 1T7
